DateTime

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • DateTime.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class represents the Date component of the DateTime class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int day
      Represents the day in the Date class
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> maxDaysInMonth
      Hashmap used to store the number of days in each month Later the days for each month are modified according to leap years
      private int month
      Represents the month in the Date class
      private int year
      Represents the year in the Date class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Date()
      Default constructor of the Date class Initializes day, month, and year with help of LocalDateTime
      Date(int day, int month, int year)
      Alternative constructor of the Date class Constructor is used when the day, month, and year is already provided

      • validateDate

        private boolean validateDate()
        Checks if this date is the dd/mm/yyyy format and performs a preliminary range check on day, month, and year
        Returns:
        true if this date follows the basic date validation constraints

      • isLeapYear

        private boolean isLeapYear(int year)
        Parameters:
        year - integer representing year of a date
        Returns:
        true of the year is a leap year.

      • isValidDate

        public boolean isValidDate()
        Checks if the date entered is a proper and valid date in dd/mm/yyyy format
        Returns:
        true if this date is valid
